Earthen pots were filled with 10 kg soil and were maintained at 20% humidity by distilled water
39 . The soil was incubated for a period of 120 days before sowing. Two varieties of lettuce (V1 = Icerberg; V2 = Boston) were grown in control soil and soil contaminated with 10% and 20% crude oil. Three kinds of treatment methods were tested; Combined application of pyrochar and thermal desorption , pyrochar alone and thermal desorption alone under control soil and soil contaminated with 10% and 20% crude oil.
